body:
There appear to be two current solution streams here, both highly volatile/preview as far as I can see:

  1. windows-store oem track: https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/iot/docs/store

  2. iot-hub device management track: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-gb/documentation/articles/iot-hub-device-management-device-jobs/
title: Clarity on Windows 10 iot-core over-air-update options?
